acceptdelegate.name: AcceptDelegate
acceptdelegate.description: Grants permission to accept the delegate invitation to share management of an Amazon Chime account with another AWS Account

activateusers.name: ActivateUsers
activateusers.description: Grants permission to activate users in an Amazon Chime Enterprise account

adddomain.name: AddDomain
adddomain.description: Grants permission to add a domain to your Amazon Chime account

addorupdategroups.description: Grants permission to add new or update existing Active Directory or Okta user groups associated with your Amazon Chime Enterprise account

associatechannelflow.description: Grants permission to associate a flow with a channel

associatephonenumberwithuser.description: Grants permission to associate a phone number with an Amazon Chime user

batchdeletephonenumber.description: Grants permission to move up to 50 phone numbers to the deletion queue

batchsuspenduser.description: Grants permission to suspend up to 50 users from a Team or EnterpriseLWA Amazon Chime account

connect.name: Connect

connectdirectory.description: Grants permission to connect an Active Directory to your Amazon Chime Enterprise account

createapikey.name: CreateApiKey
createapikey.description: Grants permission to create a new SCIM access key for your Amazon Chime account and Okta configuration

createappinstanceadmin.description: Grants permission to promote a user or bot to an AppInstanceAdmin
